articles.title: Chief Minister KCR's Party Backs Yashwant Sinha For President
articles.description: K Chandrashekhar Rao, who had bonded with Mamata Banerjee over their common goal of defeating the BJP, had earlier this month opted out of the big meeting called by her to discuss a joint strategy for the Presidential election.
